+10% Dodge Chance
name: Sparring Gloves

desc: Contributing to a kill grants +30 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 0).
name: Deathblade

desc: The wearer's Basic Attacks deal an additional 12% of the target's current Health as physical damage.
name: Giant Slayer

desc: Basic Attacks and spells heal the wearer for 25% of the damage dealt.
name: Hextech Gunblade

desc: After casting their spell, the wearer's Basic Attacks restore 18% of their max Mana on-hit.
name: Spear of Shojin

desc: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.
name: Guardian Angel

desc: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 35% of the damage dealt.
name: Bloodthirster

desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
name: Zeke's Herald

desc: The wearer gains the Blademaster trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Blade of the Ruined King

desc: Grants +100% Critical Strike Damage.
name: Infinity Edge

desc: Gain 200% Attack Range.
name: Rapid Firecannon

desc: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.
name: Guinsoo's Rageblade

desc: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 80 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies.
name: Statikk Shiv

desc: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 50 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.
name: Titan's Resolve

desc: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.
name: Runaan's Hurricane

desc: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1000/2000/3000 Health arises to continue the fight.
name: Zz'Rot Portal

desc: The wearer gains the Infiltrator trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Infiltrator's Talons

desc: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 90% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Last Whisper

desc: Grants +50% Spell Power Amplification. (All sources of Spell Power are 50% more effective)
name: Rabadon's Deathcap

desc: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 150/175/225 magic damage.
name: Luden's Echo

desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 250/275/350 damage for 8 seconds.
name: Locket of the Iron Solari

desc: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.
name: Ionic Spark

desc: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 27% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Morellonomicon

desc: The wearer gains the Demolitionist trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Demolitionist's Charge

desc: Your spells can inflict critical hits. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Jeweled Gauntlet

desc: After casting their spell, the wearer gains 20 Mana.
name: Seraph's Embrace

desc: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 50%. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect.
name: Frozen Heart

desc: When the wearer casts a spell, restores 10 mana to allies within 2 hexes (including themself).
name: Chalice of Favor

desc: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.
name: Redemption

desc: The wearer gains the Star Guardian trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Star Guardian's Charm

desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following:
  • Basic attacks and spells deal +50% Damage
  • Basic attacks heal 50 Health on-hit
name: Hand Of Justice

desc: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100/140/200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 3 seconds).
name: Bramble Vest

desc: The wearer's Basic Attacks have a 25% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from making Basic Attacks.
name: Sword Breaker

desc: Wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing 27% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Red Buff

desc: The wearer gains the Rebel trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Rebel Medal

desc: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Shroud of Stillness

desc: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%.
name: Dragon's Claw

desc: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Zephyr

desc: The wearer gains the Celestial trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Celestial Orb

desc: The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 15 seconds of combat. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Quicksilver

desc: The wearer regenerates 5% of their missing Health, but not more than 150, per second.
name: Warmog's Armor

desc: The wearer gains the Protector trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Protector's Chestguard

desc: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for 4 seconds.
name: Trap Claw

desc: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.
name: Force of Nature

desc: The wearer gains the Dark Star trait. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
name: Dark Star's Heart

desc: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level. [Consumes Three Item Slots]
name: Thief's Gloves

desc: It must do something...
name: Spatula

desc: Place on a champion to create a one-star copy of them. [CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]
name: Neeko's Help
